item.title: Elton John writes about bathroom law
item.description: Sir Elton John is the latest celebrity to weigh in on North Carolina's controversial bathroom law, penning an essay for "The Hill" about what he calls a "discriminatory bill."
item.ExtractedText:
Facebook Twitter Instagram
Elton John writes about North Carolina's bathroom law Updated 1209 GMT (2009 HKT) May 18, 2016 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John Singer Elton John poses for a portrait circa 1975. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John performs in Los Angeles in 1970. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John hangs out backstage at a show in Gainesville, Florida, in 1973. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John performs in 1973. 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John leaves a stage in the United Kingdom circa 1974. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John performs in Hawaii in 1974. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John poses for a photo with Cher and Diana Ross in the mid-1970s. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John looks out at the crowd at Dodger Stadium in Los Angeles in 1975. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John shakes hands with fans in Canada in 1979. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John performs in 1982. 10 of 28 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John and Renate Blauel leave St. Mark's Church in Australia after their wedding ceremony in 1984. The couple divorced in 1988. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John and Tina Turner perform together in 1985. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John performs in 1986. 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John walks on stage at New York's Madison Square Garden in 1989. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John and Liza Minnelli pose for a photo in 1990. Hide Caption 15 of 28 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John stands by the bed of AIDS patient Ryan White at a Florida hospital in 1990. Hide Caption 16 of 28 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John sits at a table with other celebrities, including actress Kate Capshaw, singer Bruce Springsteen, actor Tom Hanks and director Steven Spielberg, at the Elton John AIDS Foundation Party in 1994. The party was held after the Academy Awards in Los Angeles. Hide Caption 17 of 28 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John Billy Joel, John and Sting perform at a benefit concert for the Rainforest Foundation in 1995. Hide Caption 18 of 28 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John sings "Candle in the Wind" at the funeral for Princess Diana at London's Westminster Abbey in 1997. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John and Eminem address the crowd after performing together at the Grammy Awards in 2001. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John and Whitney Houston embrace during the Academy Awards in 2001. Hide Caption 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John performs on stage in Cologne, Germany, in 2011. Hide Caption 22 of 28 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John performs during the first night of his Las Vegas show, "The Million Dollar Piano," in 2011. It kicked off a three-year residency at Caesars Palace. Hide Caption 23 of 28 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John, partner David Furnish and their son, Zachary, talk with singer Bono, right, at an Academy Awards viewing party in February 2013. John and Furnish have since welcomed a second son, Elijah. Hide Caption 24 of 28 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John John speaks after receiving the Lifetime Achievement Award during the Rockefeller Foundation's "Celebration of American Philanthropy" event in October 2013. Hide Caption 25 of 28 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John British actor Tom Hardy has signed on to play Elton John in the Rocket Pictures biopic "Rocketman." The film will tell the story of John's life from his childhood to his unbelievable rise to fame. Hide Caption 26 of 28 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John Elton John married longtime partner David Furnish in December 2014. The duo have two sons conceived via in-vitro fertilization and carried by surrogate mothers. By March 2015, the famously outspoken singer was embroiled in a war of words with fashion designers Dolce & Gabbana , who said they opposed "synthetic" children from "rented" wombs. Hide Caption 27 of 28 28 photos: Photos: The legendary Elton John Elton John and the mayor of Venice, Italy, engaged in a public spat in August 2015 after the mayor banned children's books with same-sex references. Hide Caption
